text: Rise of the Tomb Raider is an action-adventure video game. It was developed by Crystal Dynamics. It was published by Square Enix and Microsoft Studios. The game is the sequel to the 2013 video game Tomb Raider. It was released in November 2015 for Xbox 360 and Xbox One. The game is set in Siberia and it follows Lara Croft and Jonah Maiava as they find an ancient city that was built by the Grand Prince of Vladimir during the 13th century. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2015 video games Category:Tomb Raider Category:Square Enix games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Linux games Category:MacOS games Category:Microsoft video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation VR games Category:Stealth video games Category:Survival video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about mental health Category:Video games based on Slavic mythology Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Xbox One games
title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
